message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $13,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I understand you're looking for a great deal.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $13,500. This price still reflects the value of the product, and I believe it's a fair compromise. Let's see if we can make this work!
